content.text: Good! Just got home from a long day at work.
Oh man, I hope you're ready to relax then! I'm just getting started with my day. What do you do for work?
I'm a barista at a coffee shop, but I'm trying to become a writer.
That's awesome! I love coffee, so I'm sure you're really good at your job. What kind of writing do you like to do?
I like to write short stories and comics. I'm also working on a novel.
That's really impressive! I've always wanted to be able to draw comics, but I'm not very good at it.
It's never too late to learn! I've been drawing since I was a little kid.
That's awesome! I wish I had that kind of talent.
You don't need talent to draw, you just need practice.
I guess you're right. Maybe I'll give it a try someday.
I'd love to see your work if you ever do!
Thanks! I'll keep you in mind.
